news_header: Trump revokes Biden's security clearance, citing past actions and trust issues.
news_original_title: Trump says he is revoking Biden's security clearance
news_text: US President Donald Trump has revoked Joe Biden's security clearance and access to intelligence briefings, referencing Biden's previous decision to deny Trump such access. Trump claims Biden cannot be trusted with classified information, citing a justice department inquiry into Biden's handling of classified files. Trump has also revoked security clearances for numerous former intelligence officials and other Biden administration figures, asserting that it is standard practice to limit security protections after leaving office.
